channel.title: command-line on Flirting With Neutrality

item.title: just vs. makefiles
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: After spending another 10 minutes trying to figure out more Makefile idiosyncrasies just to try and automate (and document) both oft and seldom issued commands, I recently found and decided to give just a try. Took less than 10 minutes to understanding what was necessary to change from my Makefile to a justfile.
